Description: Imported guitar 3 years ago in 2016 with Gibson mother of pearl lettering on headstock. Ever wanted a LP that didn't cost over 3,000.00 , but also didn't sound like a cheap import? You can now have a guitar that sounds and looks like the real thing. How? Get a beautiful Guitar, stripped down and re-engineered and rebuilt with Genuine Gibson USA, bridge, tailpiece, knobs, and Gibson USA 490 pick ups. Looks, Sounds and plays as it should. All guitars feel different to different people so I can't say its for you. For the price, you can love it. Price lowered 100.00 this week only. Goes up to 600.00 next week. So, borrow or do something to get the money, NOW The guitar in the pictures is the actual guitar you will receive. Beautiful and stunning. Standard binding and Figured Sunset Burst Finish Standard headstock with mother of pearl lettering / Standard truss rod cover Two Gibson USA 490 pick ups Original tuners Gibson Chrome ABR-1 Bridge/TailpieceChrome strapsPredrilled for Pick Guard (cream pick guard not installed, used for demonstration purpose) Pearlized TrapezoidsNo claim is made this guitar is Gibson USA, only the components. The original guitar was purchased from an importer dealer and customized in the USA. Ships next day. *****Price dropped 100.00 this week only. Price goes up 100.00 if does not sell this week. *******
Title: LP Standard Custom Guitar  Gibson USA 490 pick ups
